author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-4440: Refactor FilterCodec to get the delegate passed into ctor. Fix Codec's and PostingsFormat's forName lookup methods to throw IllegalStateException if you call those methods from the constructor of e.g. FilterCodec.

msg: Okay ... trying to contain my excitement ...
